channel.title: Pendant Productions - The Kingery
channel.itunes:author: Pendant Productions
channel.itunes:subtitle: Pendant Productions - The Kingery
channel.itunes:summary: "The Kingery" is a full-cast, ongoing sci-fi serial drama with one new episode every month.
channel.itunes:keywords: otr, old time radio, radio drama, sci-fi, science fiction

item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Rene Christine Jones with live commentary on The Kingery episode 3x07

item.description: Director Perry Whittle, and writer Pete Milan with live commentary on The Kingery episode 3x05

item.description: Episode 3x04 - Tommy tightens his grip on family business while Hooks and Devi spiral out of control.

item.title: The Kingery 2x12 - An Eye for an Eye
item.description: Episode 2x12 - The killer is revealed, Tommy and Fix have their final showdown and Sheppard incites war!

item.title: The Kingery 2x12 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x12

item.title: The Kingery 2x11 - Inside Out
item.description: Episode 2x11 - Tommy and Tythia uncover more secrets, while Hooks makes a confession to Officer Gray and Sheppard prepares his flock!

item.title: The Kingery 2x11 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writers Alicia Laine Matheson and Seth Adam Sher with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x11

item.title: The Kingery 2x10 - Fathers, Hoods
item.description: Episode 2x10 - Tommy's on the hunt for Fix, Tythia learns the truth about Sheppard, and Devi resolves to make a change!

item.title: The Kingery 2x10 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Pete Milan with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x10

item.title: The Kingery 2x09 - Pride Goeth
item.description: Episode 2x09 - Asa helps Tommy and Devi start over. Hooks reaches the boiling point, and Regina challenges Sheppard!

item.title: The Kingery 2x09 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Neal Bailey with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x09

item.title: The Kingery 2x08 - Doppelganger
item.description: Episode 2x08 - Tythia looks for salvation, and Devi faces retribution. Hooks leads detective Gray astray, as Sheppard confronts his enemies.

item.title: The Kingery 2x08 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Alicia Laine Matheson with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x08

item.title: The Kingery 2x07 - State of Flux
item.description: Episode 2x07 - Hooks talks to the police, new threats appear and Tommy decides it's time to take the fight to the source!

item.title: The Kingery 2x07 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x07

item.title: The Kingery 2x06 - The Certainty of Chance
item.description: Episode 2x06 - Sheppard looks for salvation through vices, as Tommy teaches Fix a lesson. Madeleine's investigation is frustrating everyone, including herself, and release is needed.

item.title: The Kingery 2x06 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Pete Milan with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x06

item.title: The Kingery 2x05 - Positions
item.description: Episode 2x05 - Julie returns to the Kingery and Regina does some soul-searching. Sheppard asks Tommy for a favor and Roberts tries to find a way to connect with the opposite sex.

item.title: The Kingery 2x05 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director Perry Whittle and writer Seth Adam Sher with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x05

item.title: The Kingery 2x04 - Sheep Amidst the Wolfsy
item.description: Episode 2x04 - Tythia makes a connection with Sheppard and Fix continues to push Tommy. Hooks loses it and Asa finds himself with one less friend.

item.title: The Kingery 2x03 - The Evidence of Things Not Seen
item.description: Episode 2x03 - Madeleine makes things extra difficult for Tommy and Julie seeks alternative employment opportunities. Regina maintains a vigil and Devi tries to work out some of her issues.

item.title: The Kingery 2x03 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler and Assistant Director Perry Whittle with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x03

item.title: The Kingery 2x02 - Self-made Men
item.description: Episode 2x02 - Felix flexes his muscle and Julie decides she needs time away. Hooks' problems mount and Regina and Roberts both have some difficult questions to ask of themselves.

item.title: The Kingery 2x02 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler and writer Susan Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x02

item.title: The Kingery 2x01 - The Brute Squad
item.description: Episode 2x01 - The shockwaves of Prok's death ripple through Devi and Tythia, and what has become of Adam Sheppard? The family sends someone over to "help", and combined with Madeleine stepping up the police presence at The Kingery, it's making Tommy's life hell.

item.title: The Kingery 2x01 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler, assistant director Perry Whittle and writer Susan Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 2x01

item.title: The Kingery Season 2 preview trailer
item.description: Season 2 begins on May 2, 2008!

item.title: The Kingery 1x12 - The Only Equitable Thing
item.description: Episode 12 - Tommy Arkell's office becomes a crossroads as characters collide with explosive results. Julie's secret is out, Jawbone has a lot to answer for, Betty is primed for revenge, Tythia returns and restitution must be had... no one walks out on the family.

item.title: The Kingery 1x12 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler, assistant director Perry Whittle and writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 12

item.title: The Kingery 1x11 - Rude Awakening
item.description: Episode 11 - Tythia decides it's time to go home, and Betty is determined to find her original body. Devi and Hooks make a startling discovery, Julie makes an important decision and Jawbone calls on Prok to collect a serious debt.

item.title: The Kingery 1x11 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler and head writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 11

item.title: The Kingery 1x10 - Twilight
item.description: Episode 10 - Hooks has a heart to heart with Asa, which helps him make an important decision. Sheppard's depression settles in, Betty finds a piece of home and the boss learns some upsetting information.

item.title: The Kingery 1x10 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler and head writer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 10

item.title: The Kingery 1x09 - Out of Sorts
item.description: Episode 9 - Jawbone's got revenge on his mind, but the boss is less than receptive. Roberts gets flashes of memory and with some help from Regina, hopes it will lead to clues from the past. Prok bottoms out, and Hooks' job just gets better and better.

item.title: The Kingery 1x09 COMMENTARY
item.description: Director James Tyler and director/writer Seth Adam Sher with live commentary on The Kingery episode 9

item.title: The Kingery 1x08 - Betrayals of Trust
item.description: Episode 8 - Prok goes to Hooks for help as Tythia begins to feel like she's in over her head. Betty searches for answers, Madeleine grills Tommy and Hooks finally takes a stand.

item.title: The Kingery 1x08 COMMENTARY
item.description: Directors Seth Adam Sher and James Tyler and writer Susan Bridges with live commentary on The Kingery episode 8

item.title: The Kingery 1x07 - The Big League
item.description: Episode 7 - Tythia gets the break she's been waiting for as things grow more strained between Prok and Devi. Sheppard gets a heaping dose of reality, Madeleine has her eyes on Tommy, Roberts remembers who he was and if nothing else, remember this... let the boss watch the game in peace.

item.title: The Kingery 1x06 - Heartsick
item.description: Episode 6 - The new Roberts investigates his life, but uncovers only more questions. Regina catches Sheppard with his pants down, and Tommy Arkell gets a visit from an old friend who means business.

item.title: The Kingery 1x05 - Stranger
item.description: Episode 5 - Prok's secret is discovered while Hooks and Julie bear the brunt of a bruised Jawbone. Tythia gets a chance to prove herself, and what do you do when you wake up in a body that's not yours? You go home.

item.title: The Kingery 1x04 - Broken Pawns
item.description: Episode 4 - Hooks seeks advice from Asa, whose practicality doesn't help quite as much as he hoped it would. Worried over the missing Roberts, Sheppard confides in Regina, who isn't entirely impressed with his method of attack thus far. Hooks finally goes to the Boss, and Jawbone ends up on the business end of a message: you don't kill cops. Ever.

item.title: The Kingery 1x03 - A Sparkly 'n Shadowy Place
item.description: Episode 3 - Adam Sheppard's got a contact inside the Arkell family and won't rest until he sees them crumble or dies trying. Hooks catches on to... something, but before he can figure out what he's advised to forget about it. Jawbone and Devi find what they were looking for, but will it be enough to placate the boss?

item.title: The Kingery 1x02 - High Society
item.description: Episode 2 - When cops get killed, the boss gets angry and bones get broken. Devi and Jawbone scramble to cover their tracks, and drag Prok along for the ride. Tythia finds some solace with Asa, and Adam Sheppard has a talk with one Mr. Tommy Arkell, and learns that you can't intimidate the guy who wrote the book on intimidation.

item.title: The Kingery 1x01 - Stress Management
item.description: Episode 1 - Welcome to the Kingery Road Resort and Casino, the galaxy's premiere vacation destination. Stop by the casino, take a stroll down to Shenanigans or visit the famous Saley, Onks and Liddle for a trip you'll never forget. Just watch your step, because if you cross the boss, the Kingery will chew you up and spit you out, a broken shell of what you once were.
